name: Segment Anything
usage_guide: Please refer to the tooltips to provide an indication of how to adjust parameters to change the output. Given SAM is a 2D model, it is advised to first run SAM on a few representative slices and adjust parameters to get the desired output before running on the full volume. Postprocessing (i.e. relabelling) can take a while, so only enable this when suitable parameters have been found.

metadata.description: Segment Anything is a vision foundation model with flexible prompting.

pubs.info: Main paper that describes model & data
pubs.title: Segment Anything

metadata.description: Segment Anything for Microscopy finetuned models (for)
Segment Anything for Microscopy finetuned models (for)

params.name: Points per side
params.tooltip: Number of point prompts per side, controlling density of point grid. Higher values will capture more objects (rightly or wrongly), but take longer to run.

params.name: Points per batch
params.tooltip: Number of points to process per batch. Higher values will be faster but will require more (GPU) memory.

params.name: Pred IoU threshold
params.tooltip: Threshold (range [0,1]) for model-predicted IoU, for filtering out low-confidence masks. Higher values will remove more masks.

params.name: Stability score threshold
params.tooltip: Threshold (range [0,1]) for mask stability score. Higher values will remove more masks, in conjunction with stability score offset that controls level of stability measured.

params.name: Stability score offset
params.tooltip: Amount to shift the cutoff for stability score. Higher values will remove less stable masks.

params.name: Box NMS IoU threshold
params.tooltip: The IoU threshold (range [0,1]) for non-maximum suppression of boxes. Lower values will merge more masks, useful to reduce mask 'halos' and speed-up postprocessing, but could lead to undersegmentation/agglomeration.

params.name: Crop N layers
params.tooltip: Values >0 will crop the image into N layers, which will be processed separately, giving more detail but taking longer. Each deeper layer will have more crops (2^N). Balance number of point prompts with 'Crop N points downscale factor'.

params.name: Crop NMS IoU threshold
params.tooltip: Same as Box NMS IoU threshold, but for each crop.

params.name: Crop overlap ratio
params.tooltip: The amount which crops overlap. Higher values may help identify more objects, but duplicates computation.

params.name: Crop N points downscale factor
params.tooltip: Value to be raised to the power of the crop layer will be used to scale down number of points per side in each crop. Higher values will reduce point grid density in deeper layers.

params.name: Min mask region area
params.tooltip: Size (in pixels) of masks to remove if identified as a disconnected region or hole.
